column2: Description

column1: Episode 1: A pea in a haystack. (4 October 2016)

column2: Prize: Most flamboyant clock.
Get to a microwave in as few steps as possible.
Propel this pea the furthest distance and land on a red carpet.
Make the best snowman.
Live: Balance as many swedes on a Swede as possible.

column1: Episode 2: The dong and the gong. (11 October 2016)

column2: Prize: Heaviest item that can fit in a shoebox.
Surprise Alex when he emerges from the shed after an hour.
Team Puzzle: Release Alex.
Create the best upside-down self portrait  using condiments.
Pop the balloons as quickly as possible.
Live: Unravel a whole roll of sticky tape and place in a lunchbox.

column1: Episode 3: Little polythene grief cave. (18 October 2016)

column2: Prize: Best battery-operated item.
Fill an egg cup with your own sweat.
Make the best domino rally.
Buy a gift for the Taskmaster with £20.
Create the best flag meal.
Live: Anchor these balloons using only bread.

column1: Episode 4: A very nuanced character. (25 October 2016)

column2: Prize: Shiniest thing.
Spread your clothes as far and wide as possible.
Find out what this gentleman did for a living, but he could only reply falsely.
Team: Make the most special effect.
Live: Wearing a blindfold, cover yourself in sticky notes.
Have the most fun on a bouncy castle for one hour.
Prize: Most handsome relative.
Move the water from bucket A to bucket B without moving the buckets.
Team: Play Charades across a river, with giant foam hands.
Do something that looks brilliant when sped up or slowed down.
Live: Place the lowest unique number of doughnuts on a stick.
